comments.body: Why not document the last three fields? You're almost there! :smile:
Is logging enough when this happens? What does `shout` do?
Shout leaves an error log in .dart_tool/build/generated/<<build-id>>/<<package>>/<<path>> that can be read out later. I believe this also causes the build to complete with an error, will double-check
nit: how about `generatedPackagesFilePath` to disambiguate from `.packages`?
I'm going to delete this file in the next PR, so for the sake of brevity I'll leave it as is for now.
